metadata.title: Marchome Faux Rabbit Fur Pull Through Strap Wrist Handbag Purse for Women
features: Made of high quality faux rabbit fur, soft and smooth felling. It's lined on the inside.
Measures: Approx. 12.2 in. (L) x 0.8 in. (W) x 013.4 in. (H) / 31*2*34cm
Feature: you could pull the other handle threw and hold on to one handle.
Magnetic button closure, no pocket inside just a bag. Great for daily use, party, prom, wedding, fancy events.
Large enough to accommodate your phone, wallet, keys, phone, credit cards, id cards, checkbook and lipstick for daily and weekend use.
description: The faux fur material is nice and smooth. 15 colors are avaliable for you to choose. Size: (L*W*H)Approx. 12.2" * 0.8" * 13.4"/ 31*2*34cm Large capacity for A4 magazine, cell phone and tablet along with your necessary stuff. Can pull the other handle threw and hold on to one handle. It's lined on the inside. Makes a great gift for new year, birthday, sisters, friends and anyone who loves fashion tote bag! It is the perfect combination of classy and practical. Ideal purse for using in office, school, travel or any other daily occasions.
